ygData.subject: Re: Help me!
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a 26 DE SK, and he is great fun. Only problems I can see is for solo work (which I do most of the time) he has zero buffs and cant heal so downtime is
ygData.messageBody:
I have a 26 DE SK, and he is great fun. Only
problems I can see is for solo work (which I do most of
the time) he has zero buffs and cant heal so downtime
is very lengthy. Trolls and Ogres are good in that
they are very strong but not very smart so dont learn
skills very fast. I havn't tried and Iksar so dont have
much to say about them except that they cant wear the
really cool SK quest armor so that is a
bummer.<br>Anyway, good luck and have fun!<br><br>Uinan
D'Mortuus<br>DE SK of Erollisi Marr Server
